original_text: And Balak did as Balaam had said, and offered a bullock and a ram on every altar.
korean_text: 발락이 발람의 말대로 행하여 각 제단에 수송아지와 숫양을 드리니라

sentences.original_text: And Balak did as Balaam had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 발락은 발람이 말한 대로 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and offered a bullock and a ram
